title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4205.5 - Ownership affidavit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4205.5 - Ownership affidavit

State Regulations

An owner to be eligible for a license shall be required
to submit an affidavit as to his ownership or lease of all horses in his
possession. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4205.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
